name: Vill
description:
Play as Vill as she prepares for the arrival of a hero intent on saving the day

I'm gay and I've always loved villains (and the moon). As such, whenever normally smart villains do dumb things, it drives me nuts. This very short game is me trying to rationalize some of the actions they take

I made this game for a friend, so it is not particularly polished, but later decided to post it in the kiss the moon jam for kicks--I think the half-finished nature of the ending particularly fits the theme
